body_html:
It seems ok.

Perhaps the change description say explicitly on its first line
that C++11's thread_local causes crashes on various versions of the NDK.
The phrase "NDK doesn't support thread_local well"
could be taken incorrectly to mean that it's merely slow.
body_text:
It seems ok.
Perhaps the change description say explicitly on its first line
that C++11's thread_local  causes crashes on various versions of the NDK.
The phrase  "NDK doesn't support thread_local well"
could be taken incorrectly to mean that it's merely slow.
body:
It seems ok.

Perhaps the change description say explicitly on its first line 
that C++11's thread_local  causes _crashes_ on various versions of the NDK.  
The phrase  "NDK doesn't support thread_local well" 
could be taken incorrectly to mean that it's merely slow.
